Rod Stoddard was the star actor portraying the titular character in the Hubris Comics series The Adventures of Captain Cosmos, filmed at the Hub 360 film studio in October 2077.
Roy Baker was the director of The Adventures of Captain Cosmos at the Hub 360 film studio in October 2077.
